Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Stony Island
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 63rd, Lake Shore Drive, 57th & Hyde Park, due to street blockage near 63rd/Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Stony Island, 63rd, Lake Shore Drive, 57th & Hyde Park, due to street blockage near 63rd/Stony Island.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Southbound Reroute near 71st/Champlain
ShortDescription: Southbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, St. Lawrence, South Chicago & 71st: due to, street blockage near 71st/Champlain.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Garfield. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Garfield. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
